column6:
"GHOSTS ON THE RAILS" ,2005,2
Some angry ghosts with unfinished business are wreaking havoc in the New York subways, and only Nightcrawler can meet them on their own terms-in the dark! Part 2 (of 2).
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | inker:Wayne Faucher | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Darick Robertson | penciller (cover):Bill Sienkiewicz
